SETTING_MESSAGE:
#Welcome in Natao

 Before going further, I need some informations to know you better
SETTING_MESSAGE_DATABASE: Your database file to start, a good advice is to have it in your Dropbox
SETTING_MESSAGE_NAME: I also need your first name and your name
SETTING_MESSAGE_THEME: Finnally, you must choose a color theme
SETTING_MESSAGE_DONE: And that's it, we can start after you click on the upper left button
BTN_MAKE_MODEL: Save the structure as a template
CONFIRM_DELETE_FOLDER: Are you sure you want to delete this folder ?
CONFIRM_DELETE_DOCUMENT: Are you sure you want to delete this document ?
CONFIRM_SAVE_TEMPLATE: Are you sure you want to change this template structure ?
